short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically get notified of discount codes available for sites you visit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get notified of discount codes available for the sites you visit.

As you browse the web Every Discount will notify you if there's discount codes for the sites you visit. If there's not, it'll offer you similar sites that have discount codes.

We have thousands of discount codes for thousands of retailers in the UK, and update them several times a day.

Every Discount respects your privacy never tracks your browsing activity.
